title: Vayne is the most toxic champion in the game and should be deleted.
body: Not because of her kit or power. But because 90% of the raging asshole dirtbags happen to be projecting their rage through vayne. Vayne is somehow an enabler of toxic behavior and everyone knows it. There's a reason vayne has the stereotype she has. If Riot's serious about keeping a healthy community, they'll remove vayne from the roster.
